The camera settings for Photo Mode can be toggled from the HUD, located near the minimap, or by using the hotkey binding (F9 on PC, and by pressing both analog sticks at the same time on console), you’ll get to choose which character you want to take center stage, determine their best side, and adjust the camera position to suit.
